text:
Maintenance and operation of each market established under the provisions of this Chapter shall be financed by fees charged to producers who utilize the facilities of the market and by such other funds as may be appropriated therefor in accordance with the budgetary procedure of the Charter. 
(Ord. No. 4719(1939), Sec. 1; amended by Ord. 276-99, File No. 991545, App. 10/29/99)
